name: Longsword
text: Attack: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Shield
text: Block Actions you take instead prevent all physical damage.

name: Plate Armor
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 2.

name: Leather Vest
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 1.

name: Dagger
text: Minor Attack: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Sling
text: Attack: Deal 2 damage to a target.

name: Staff
text: Attack: Deal 3 fire damage to a target.

name: Mace
text: Attack: Deal 3 piercing damage to an adjacent target.

name: Holy Symbol
text: You gain 'Minor: Heal target ally for 1.

name: Hammer
text: Attack: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Handaxe
text: Minor Attack: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent target.
